list_definition.definition: to make as little as possible

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Our aim is to minimize the danger as far as possible.

list_definition.definition: to cause to seem little or unimportant

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He minimized the help he had received.
